info.description: A recreation of the (shuttered) pypip.in API that uses shields.io instead
info.title: pypip.in Replacement API

get.summary: A badge describing the format that the Python library is packaged as (ex. wheel, egg)

parameters.name: package
parameters.description: The PyPI package to produce the badge for

parameters.name: text
parameters.description: Override the default left-hand-side text (URL-Encoding needed for spaces or special characters!)

parameters.name: style
parameters.description: The style you want to use for the badge (flat is the default as of Feb 1st 2015)

Access-Control-Allow-Origin.description: URI that may access the resource
